title: [1.7.2/1.7.10][SSP/SMP][InfStudio]Gleen'Gases丨瓦斯，矿工的末日
author: 时透无一年
txt_content:
本帖最后由 C似水流年 于 2015-8-8 21:56 编辑 

----- 前言 -----
在地下里除了怪物、矿石、空气以外是不是还缺了点什么呢？
该Mod增加了一系列气体和一些机器，这些气体会出现在天然矿洞里
这些气体有些可燃，有些有毒，令矿工们甚是头疼
但是利用得当可以有着极大的用处
如果你觉得挖矿太简单的话不妨尝试一下这个Mod吧
----- Mod图片 -----





gas_1.png (262.51 KB, 下载次数: 406)

下载附件

2014-8-18 19:23 上传











nBQvoYw.jpg (176.79 KB, 下载次数: 401)

下载附件

2014-8-18 19:24 上传






----- Mod特性 -----

Neat flowing gases with different properties!
Generated gas pockets! They don't surface in the caves, so you'll only find them if you dig for them.
Smoke!
Deadly steam! Better be careful when farming that obsidian.
Lanterns! They might look fancy but they are vital to your survival!
Gas Pipes, pumps, collectors, and filtering!
Gas Furnace! It's faster, and can smelt a whole stack of coal into a diamond!

这些气体有些有毒，有些可燃，有些利用的好的话是有很大的作用的
但总体而言他们都令矿工们头疼，因为有时候危险的到来仅仅是因为一根火把





gascomic.png (300.27 KB, 下载次数: 408)

下载附件

2014-8-18 19:35 上传







----- Mod教程 -----
贴吧：http://tieba.baidu.com/p/3239445921 [楼主非本人，教程施工中]
官方：http://jamieswhiteshirt.com/minecraft/mods/gases/information/
----- 作者的更新日志 -----

v1.5.1.1
Fixed major issues with the core parts of Glenn's Gases and Gases Framework causing them not to be properly loaded.Added a recipe for Block of Refined Diabaline.

v1.5.1
Heavily tweaked the Gas Furnace. It now emits smoke on top. The time the furnace will keep burning for is displayed in the GUI as a fuel level. The furnace will now have a starting smelting speed of 0, but can reach 10x ordinary furnace speed. The furnace will burn as long as fuel is supplied, regardless of items being smelted or not. Items will be smelted as long as the furnace is warm. Shift-clicking now works properly.Added Diabaline Ore, Refined Diabaline and Block of Refined Diabaline. This material can only be refined in a Gas Furnace.Added Rusted Iron Ingot.Chlorine Gas will now damage and rust eligible dropped items.Custom Gas Furnace recipes can now be added in a configuration file.Added Iocalfaeus Gas.Added Dust.Tweaked the transparency of gases.Gas Tanks will now interact with tanks directly above or below.Rusted Iron Ore, Rusted Iron Block and Rusted Iron Ingot can now be smelted into ordinary iron in a Gas Furnace.Red Gas will now explode on contact with water.Added some fields to the Configurations.Entities that are on fire or hold certain items will now ignite gas on contact. Dropped items of the same type will also ignite gas.Steam no longer replaces solid blocks when appearing.Gas explosions are slightly less powerful.Changed recipe for Gas Sensitive Chip.



----- 安装方法 -----
1.从百度云/官网下载下mod压缩包
2.解压压缩包，把里面的4个文件拖入Mods里
3.启动游戏，体验新的15种气体吧owo
----- 下载地址 -----
支持作者，戳官网
汉化戳百度云

如果喜欢这个搬运的话可以留下评分或意见owo
[groupid=534]InfinityStudio[/groupid]
